title: Man Threatens To Kill Wife If Not Added On FB | True Crime Sunday
description:
Okla. man pleads guilty to strangling, threatening to kill wife if she didn't add him on Facebook

Decaying body of missing Ohio man found in the garage under boards

Decomposing body found on NorCal couch with a daughter living upstairs in 'uninhabitable' home

Wichita woman gets 'Hard 50' for decapitating ex-boyfriend's mom, while still aliveÂ
